response: narrative=Georgina Burke was reported missing from her home on Cross Street after a recent bereavement. She was last seen by her foster father leaving for a study group at the youth center near Caledonian Road, Perth.

narrative=Georgina Burke went missing after attending a night out linked to an organized protest at a youth center near a public park. Colleagues mentioned she had gone missing before. She was last seen near 6 Seggieden Place, St Madoes, PH2 7TU.
